keyMoments.title: Uses Buso Koka: Gomu Gomu no Bullet
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates mastery of Armament Haki hardening by delivering a devastating punch to Hody Jones, sending him crashing into a cliffside.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Luffy's enhanced post-timeskip combat abilities and mastery of Armament Haki in battle.
keyMoments.quote: Buso Koka: Gomu Gomu no Bullet!

keyMoments.title: Uses Atama Buso: Gomu Gomu no Kane
keyMoments.description: Luffy employs Armament Haki hardening on his head for a powerful headbutt attack against Hody Jones.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's versatility in applying Haki to different body parts.

keyMoments.title: Decides to Follow and Protect Shirahoshi
keyMoments.description: Luffy prepares to follow Shirahoshi to Noah to protect her from danger.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the arc's climax where Luffy must save both Shirahoshi and Fish-Man Island.

abilities.abilityName: Buso Koka: Gomu Gomu no Bullet
abilities.description: Luffy hardens his fist with Armament Haki and delivers a devastating short-distance punch to an opponent's abdomen.

abilities.abilityName: Atama Buso: Gomu Gomu no Kane
abilities.description: Luffy hardens his head with Armament Haki and uses it as a weapon in a headbutt attack.

keyMoments.title: Sacrifices Herself as a Decoy
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi makes the selfless decision to swim directly toward Noah to use herself as a lure and save Fish-Man Island.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Shirahoshi's courage and character growth, showing her willingness to sacrifice herself for her people.
keyMoments.quote: I won't let everyone on Fish-Man Island die because of me!

name.japanese: バンダー・デッケン九世

keyMoments.title: Betrays Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken IX turns against his ally Hody Jones and declares his intention to kill Shirahoshi and destroy Fish-Man Island after being rejected.
keyMoments.significance: The breakdown of the villain alliance creates additional chaos and reveals Decken's obsessive, unhinged nature.
keyMoments.quote: If I cannot have you, Shirahoshi, then no one will! I'll destroy everything!

keyMoments.title: Abandons Wadatsumi
keyMoments.description: Decken coldly tells Wadatsumi he must be sacrificed, explaining that his Mark-Mark Fruit ability cannot be stopped once activated.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the unstoppable nature of Decken's Devil Fruit and his ruthless disregard for allies.
keyMoments.quote: I cannot save you, Wadatsumi! You must be sacrificed for the cause!

relationships.description: Former ally turned enemy after Decken betrays Hody and turns Noah against everyone.

evolutionMoments.description: Decken betrays Hody Jones, ending their alliance.

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Devastated by Luffy's Haki Attack
keyMoments.description: Hody is sent crashing into a cliffside by Luffy's Armament Haki-enhanced attack, showing the vast power difference.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that Hody's attacks are ineffective against Luffy's post-timeskip abilities.

keyMoments.title: Pursues Noah via Chains
keyMoments.description: Despite his injuries, Hody grabs onto Noah's massive chains to pursue both Decken and Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hody's determination and sets up the continuation of the battle aboard Noah.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Noah's Significance
keyMoments.description: King Neptune explains that Noah must not be damaged and is not meant to move until the 'Promised Day' comes.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals critical information about Noah's ancient purpose and connection to Joy Boy's promise.
keyMoments.quote: That ship is not meant to move till the 'Promised Day' comes!

reveals.information: Noah is connected to an ancient promise and should not move until the Promised Day
